CustomField.description: "+++ INTEGRATION: MASTER DATA +++ Do not change this field without reviewing impact with master data integration" #RQ-004465- Sync'ed with CMD, shows if a contact is active or not. Inactive means they are no longer employed by the account the contact record is linked to. #RQ-004927
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to inactive when the contact is no longer employed by the company/account this contact is linked to. Never delete the contact in this scenario
CustomField.label: Contact Status
